This paper seems also relevant to the discussion
author: Igor Shinkar

content: Thanks Igor! I wasn't aware of this fourth proof.
author: Luca Aceto

content: Working together, Professor Delić and I have convinced ourselves that, unfortunately, there are serious issues with his proof of the Dichotomy Conjecture. Professor Delić no longer claims he solved the Dichotomy Conjecture. So the proofs by Bulatov and by Zhuk remain the only two proofs which are still probably correct.
author: Petar Markovi
